name: Inventory
description: Optimize your stock, avoid losses, and make smart decisions with our advanced inventory management solution.

features.title: Complete Product Management
items: Product registration with SKU code, barcode, and QR code.
Classification by categories and subcategories for better organization.
Support for multiple suppliers per product.
Dynamic pricing and costs with automatic margin calculation.
Custom measurement units (Kg, Liters, Units, etc.).
Image gallery and detailed technical sheets.

features.title: Smart Stock Control
items: Real-time updates on stock entries and exits.
Automatic alerts for low stock, overstock, or expirations.
Management of multiple warehouses with individual control.
Detailed inventory adjustment records (shrinkage, theft, returns).
Movement history with user, date, and reason for the change.
Unique stock codes for precise traceability.

features.title: Cost and Price Optimization
items: Automatic calculation of average cost and profitability.
Custom price lists.
Volume discounts or promotions with scheduled duration.
Application of custom taxes (VAT).
Price change history with user control.

features.title: Advanced Reporting and Analytics
items: Real-time reports on stock, costs, and sales.
Best-selling products and low-turnover items to optimize purchases.
Profitability analysis to maximize margins.
Purchase and sales history by product and supplier.
Data export in Excel, PDF, and CSV.

features.title: Security and Access Control
items: Customizable user profiles (Administrator, Warehouse, Sales, Auditor).
Audit log with a history of modifications.
Locking of products and warehouses to prevent errors.
